## Load ESSENCE Training R Project Directory from Github

You can either:

\- Download the directory as a zipped file and load it into your RStudio environment (click on "code" and "download .ZIP") , then Upload the zipped file to your R files.

\- Copy the https URL address below (or the https link from "Code") then go to File -\> New Project -\> Version Control -\> Git -\> paste the URL -\> Click Create Project

The project URL is: <https://github.com/andrew-farrey/ESSENCE_Training.git>

I'll drop the link in the meeting chat so it is readily accessible.
